title: The Diamond Bird and other tales
description: FROM FRONT COVER:This collection of fairytales was as-sembled as a memorial on the 100th anniversary of the birth of one ofSweden's most popular writers, Anna Wahlenberg. Her tales areloved by children and adults inScandinavia and this is a selectionof her best stories.The Diamond Bird is a wonder-ful tale about a parrot that grows diaminds on the tips of her feathers,...
author: Anna Wahlenberg
